Class that implements the stream processor

    • kvstoreName

      private java.lang.String kvstoreName
      Name of the ktble store is not the default one

    • previousTimeStamp

      private long previousTimeStamp
      Timestamp that indicates the last time we read a topic

    • programInitTime

      private long programInitTime
      The time we initialize the program

    • readingTimeInterval

      private int readingTimeInterval
      Interval (in milliseconds) between 2 readings of a topic

    • problemType

      private java.lang.String problemType
      The problem type that indicates the type of data

    • previousTrainingTime

      private long previousTrainingTime
      Timestamp of the previous training step (Last time we trained the model)

    • trainingInterval

      private long trainingInterval
      Interval (in milliseconds) between 2 trainings of a model

    • trainingMaxData

      private long trainingMaxData
      Max amount of time records stored in InfluxDB from which the model is trained. Beyond that limit, the model is no longer trained

    • onlineTrain

      private boolean onlineTrain
      Model's inference activation (default=true)

    • onlineInference

      private boolean onlineInference
      Model is trained online (default=true)

    • className

      private java.lang.String className
      Name of the class of the algorithm we use

    • prePostProcessor

      private PrePostProcessor prePostProcessor
      Class with the preprocessor method for the incoming data. If null means that no processing is needed

    • metrics

      private java.util.Vector<Metric> metrics
      Class with the metrics to evaluate the incoming data. If null means that no processing is needed

    • id

      private java.lang.String id
      Unique identifier of the processor

    • countReceivedRecords

      private int countReceivedRecords
      It counts the number of records received so far by the system It is used in method in process() to form the kvStore key

    • visualization

      boolean visualization

    • operateData

      private void operateData​(long currentTime)
      Method that works with the data at current time. The data are read from a topic, stored in InfluxDB and sent to the algorithm module
